item.title: How to Optimize Flutter App Performance: Techniques No One Talks About
item.description: In the world of mobile app development, performance is king. Users expect fast, responsive apps that don’t drain their battery or consume excessive data. While Flutter is known for its ability to create beautiful, high-performance applications, there are still many ways to optimize your app that are often overlooked. In this comprehensive guide, we’ll explore lesser-known techniques to boost your Flutter app’s performance, ensuring a smooth and efficient user experience. These are the tips that go beyond the basics and dive into advanced optimizations.

item.title: How to Monitor Android Device Storage Space Using Flutter
item.description:
As developers, it’s important to keep an eye on device storage, especially when building applications that handle large files, such as multimedia or downloaded content. Flutter offers a straightforward way to check both internal and external storage on Android devices using the flutter_storage_info package.

In this blog post, we’ll walk through how to use the flutter_storage_info package to monitor storage space on Android devices, providing a step-by-step guide and practical examples.
